mapper.insert: INSERT INTO talentOption(optionNum, optionName, tboardNum, parentOption) VALUES(#{optionNum}, #{optionName}, #{tboardNum}, #{parentOption, jdbcType=INTEGER})
INSERT INTO tmOptionDetail(detailNum, optionNum, optionValue) VALUES(#{detailNum}, #{optionNum}, #{optionValue})
mapper.select: SELECT categoryNum, categoryName, use FROM talentCategory WHERE use = 1 ORDER BY categoryNum
mapper.update: UPDATE talentmarket SET categoryNum = #{categoryNum}, typeNum = #{typeNum}, subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, price = #{price}, optionCount = #{optionCount}, guidelines = #{guidelines}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, updateDate = SYSDATE WHERE tboardNum = #{tboardNum}
UPDATE talentOption SET optionName = #{optionName} WHERE optionNum = #{optionNum}
UPDATE tmOptionDetail SET optionValue = #{optionValue} WHERE detailNum = #{detailNum}
UPDATE talentmarket SET hitCount = hitCount +1 WHERE tboardNum = #{tboardNum}
UPDATE talentmarket SET talentshow = 0 WHERE tboardNum= #{tboardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT tboardNum,t.subject,t.content,price,guidelines,t.regDate,t.userId,t.typeNum,talentShow,t.categoryNum,c.categoryName,optionCount,t.thumbnail,t.hitCount,t.town,p.type ,m.nickName FROM talentMarket t JOIN talentCategory c ON t.categoryNum = c.categoryNum JOIN tmPurchaseType p ON t.typeNum = p.typeNum JOIN member m ON t.userId = m.userId WHERE t.tboardNum = #{tboardNum}
SELECT optionNum, optionName, parentOption, tboardNum FROM talentOption WHERE tboardNum = #{tboardNum} ORDER BY parentOption NULLS FIRST, parentOption
SELECT detailNum, optionNum, optionValue FROM tmOptionDetail WHERE optionNum = #{optionNum} ORDER BY detailNum
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tmBookMarks WHERE tboardNum = #{tboardNum} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tmBookMarks WHERE tboardNum = #{tboardNum}
SELECT tboardNum, userId FROM tmBookMarks WHERE tboardNum = #{tboardNum} AND userId = #{userId}
